summary: 2000 FORD TAURUS (24 VALVE DURATECH ENGINE)  COMPLAINT #1 - WARPED ROTORS AT 21,757 MILES. PAID TO HAVE MACHINED,                            NOT COVERED UNDER WARRANTY.  COMPLAINT #2 - EXCESSIVE FUEL ODOR INSIDE CAR. BAD FUEL LINE GASKET $476 TO REPAIR.                          THIS WAS AN ONGOING PROBLEM THAT STARTED WITH REPLACEMENT OF FUEL                          PUMP AND FUEL INJECTORS @ ABOUT 22,000 MILES (UNDER WARRANTY)                          BUT NOW IS BEING REPAIRED AS A BAD FUEL LINE GASKET (NOT UNDER                           WARRANTY) @ 39,000 MILES AND TO THE TUNE OF $476 DOLLARS.
